original: 歷仕蜀漢、曹魏。名字或為李韶。姜維四度北伐，遣李歆、句安先行前往麴山築城據守。魏將陳泰以計阻斷糧道，李歆、句安見城中無糧，外無援兵，遂投降曹魏。
text: Li Shi Han, Cao Wei. The name may be Li Shao. During the fourth northern expedition, Jiang Wei sent Li Xin and Ju'an to Qushan to build a fortress. Wei Jiang Chen Tai blocked the food road, and Li Xin and Juan saw that there was no food in the city and no foreign troops, so they surrendered to Cao Wei.
